*END USER LICENSE AGREEMENT* \n\n 1. LICENSE
By installing and/or using using Seglio (\"Application \"), you agree that this End User
User License Agreement (EULA) is a legally binding and valid contract and agree to be
bound by it. You agree to abide by the intellectual property laws and all of the terms
and conditions of this Agreement.
Your use of Seglio indicates your acceptance of this license agreement and warranty.
Subject to the terms of this Agreement, Seglio grants to you a limited, non-exclusive,
non-transferable license, without right to sub-license, to use Seglio in accordance with
this Agreement and any other written agreement with Seglio. Seglio does not transfer
the title of Seglio to you; the license granted to you is not a sale. This agreement is a
binding legal agreement between Seglio and the purchasers or users of Seglio.
If you do not agree to be bound by this agreement, remove Seglio from your device.
\n\n
2. DISTRIBUTION
Seglio and the license herein granted shall not be copied, shared, distributed, re-sold,
offered for re-sale, transferred or sub-licensed in whole or in part except that you may
make one copy for archive purposes only.
\n\n3. USER AGREEMENT \n 3.1 Personal Use Only
Seglio and all related services (the \"Services\") are available only for your personal, non-
commercial use. You may not use the Services to increase traffic to your application for
commercial reasons or sell a service or product unless you enter into an agreement
with Seglio describing the terms of your commercial use. You may not \"meta search\"
any information relating to the Services, including, without limitation, any posted book
review (the \"Reviews\"). You may not reproduce, distribute, store, broadcast, sell or
sublicense information or content included on the application without obtaining prior
written consent of an authorized representative of App Name. Seglio reserves all rights
not granted herein, including all copyrights.
Please contact Seglio if you are interested in entering into an agreement with Seglio
regarding your potential commercial use of the Services or use the \"Apply to sell books
on Seglio\" link found on the home page for more information. \n\n 3.2 Use Restrictions
You shall use Seglio in compliance with all applicable laws and not for any unlawful
purpose. \n\n
3.3 Copyright Restriction
This Application contains copyrighted material, trade secrets and other proprietary
material. You shall not, and shall not attempt to, modify, reverse engineer, disassemble
or decompile Seglio. Nor can you create any derivative works or other works that are
based upon or derived from Seglio in whole or in part.
Seglio\'s name, logo and graphics file that represents Seglio shall not be used in any way
to promote products developed with Seglio. Seglio retains sole and exclusive ownership
of all right, title and interest in and to Seglio and all Intellectual Property rights relating
thereto.
Copyright law and international copyright treaty provisions protect all parts of Seglio,
products and services. No program, code, part, image, audio sample, or text may be
copied or used in any way by the user except as intended within the bounds of the
single user program. All rights not expressly granted hereunder are reserved for Seglio.
\n\n 3.4 Limitation of Responsibility
You will indemnify, hold harmless, and defend Seglio , its employees, agents and
distributors against any and all claims, proceedings, demand and costs resulting from or
in any way connected with your use of Seglio.
In no event (including, without limitation, in the event of negligence) will Seglio , its
employees, agents or distributors be liable for any consequential, incidental, indirect,
special or punitive damages whatsoever (including, without limitation, damages for loss
of profits, loss of use, business interruption, loss of information or data, or pecuniary
loss), in connection with or arising out of or related to this Agreement, Seglio or the use
or inability to use Seglio or the furnishing, performance or use of any other matters
hereunder whether based upon contract, tort or any other theory including negligence.
\n\n3.5 Warranties
Except as expressly stated in writing, Seglio makes no representation or warranties in
respect of this Application and expressly excludes all other warranties, expressed or
implied, oral or written, including, without limitation, any implied warranties of
merchantable quality or fitness for a particular purpose. \n\n
3.6 Governing Law
This Agreement shall be governed by the law of the Indian Government applicable
therein. You hereby irrevocably attorn and submit to the non-exclusive jurisdiction of
the courts of India therefrom. If any provision shall be considered unlawful, void or
otherwise unenforceable, then that provision shall be deemed severable from this
License and not affect the validity and enforceability of any other provisions.
\n\n3.7 Termination
Any failure to comply with the terms and conditions of this Agreement will result in
automatic and immediate termination of this license. Upon termination of this license
granted herein for any reason, you agree to immediately cease use of Seglio and
destroy all copies of Seglio supplied under this Agreement.
\n\n3.8 Modification
Seglio may modify or terminate the Services for any reason, and without notice,
without any liability to you, any other user or any third party. Seglio reserves the right
to modify the Terms from time to time without notice. By accessing this application or
using the Services after any changes to the Terms have been posted thereon, you will
be deemed to have consented to all such changes. Please review the Terms from time
to time so that you will be aware of any changes.
\n\n3.9 Indemnification
You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold harmless Seglio, and each of their
officers, directors, employees, agents, representatives, information providers and
licensors, from any claims, costs, losses, damages, judgments and expenses, including
but not limited to reasonable attorney\'s fees, relating to or arising out of any breach of
this agreement or any use of the Services by you, or by another person using the
Services through you or using your device.
\n\n4. DISCLAIMER OF WARRANTY
This application and the accompanying files are available for download \"as is\" and
without warranties as to performance or merchantability or any other warranties
whether expressed or implied. This disclaimer concerns all files generated and edited
by Seglio as well.
\n\n5. CONSENT OF USE OF DATA
You agree that Seglio may collect and use information gathered in any manner as part
of the product support services provided to you, if any, related to Seglio.Seglio may also
use this information to provide notices to you which may be of use or interest to you

Choose a safe locality with considerable crowd presence for the meet.


Always complete the transaction in the first meet.


The buyer must make sure that the book received matches the details as put up on the app by the seller.


Do not share your financial information except the one involving the payment.


Seglio isn’t, in any way, responsible for any actions of the buyer or seller.
Shout outs to Krishna for the vectors, Karthiknathan for the app icon and Mira for the app descriptions.

Find your now-idle college textbooks a better place than the back of you dusty closet. With Biblio, generosity and self-interest go hand in hand. 

 A quick tap at POST and you can fill out the details of the books you're looking to see, one at a time. Tap on the account icon to have a look at all your posts and manage them. Buyers can end the hunt for an elusive textbook with SEARCH. Move over to RECENT to view the list of books that have been (recently) added. 

 Time to bid your old books a cheery farewell and welcome your new ones without crashing your bank.
